text: Kawasaki Heavy Industries & CSR Qingdao Sifang C151A is the fourth generation of rolling stock used on the Singapore MRT system. The trains operate on the East West Line and North South Line. The trains began operation on 27 May 2011. They were built by Kawasaki Heavy Industries and CSR Sifang. 35 six- carriage trains, totalling 210 carriages, were built in China. ==Related pages== *Kawasaki Heavy Industries C151 *Siemens C651 *Kawasaki Heavy Industries & Nippon Sharyo C751B *Kawasaki Heavy Industries & CSR Qingdao Sifang C151B *Kawasaki Heavy Industries & CRRC Sifang C151C Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) Category:Rolling stock
title: Kawasaki Heavy Industries & CSR Qingdao Sifang C151A
